title: The Ig Nobel Prize
description:
Neil deGrasse Tyson and co-host Leighann Lord dive into the strange world of the Ig速 Nobel Prize for research that first makes you laugh, and then makes you think.
Read more and listen to the full episode at http://www.startalkradio.net/show/the-ig-nobel-prize
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
